Text:
Looking forward to this very much!

Long live the fan edits!
You're a fag for altering the DVD by checking if people have an original copy. Why would I d/l the DVD if I have an original?? Keep ripping and stop altering the DVD.

its not a rip you numty its a fanedit.  they are completely different things.

go to fanedit.org and become less ignorant.

So you basically added the deleted scenes to the original movie? That's actually pretty damn cool if so. I'm going to start doing that with my movies from now on hehe. I hate watching deleted scenes by themselves and always wanted to watch them in the actual movie. I will download anyways!
Thanks for the link to fanedit.org! That site is seriously awesome. I didn't know what the hell it was at first but now I'm downloading about 4 movies from there. Thanks again!
